header_text: Your friends are all in relationships. You are not currently in a relationship, and you wonder if there is something wrong with you. You think that you are undesirable.

elements.text: After a while, you realize that it is very normal to not be in a relationship. You think that you enjoy being single, and the right person will come along when you are...
